roleset.name: show (off)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The bank added that it believes the review will ``demonstrate that First Union is in compliance with the requirements of the Community Reinvestment Act.''
example.arg: that First Union is in compliance with the requirements of the Community Reinvestment Act

example.name: nonviolent political action
example.text: John demonstrated in front of City Hall.
example.note: This is almost a separate roleset, except that Arg1 defaults to "one'sdispleasure with the political/social status quo" and could bestated. Arg2 also defaults to "passers by" or "the media" or something.

roleset.note: Comparison with 'show'. Member of VNcls indicate-78-1-1, transfer_mesg-37.1.1.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'demonstrate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus.
